Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local torso = nil local partyRadius = 50 local mouseCon = nil local gui = nil local player = nil local firstTime = true
local sound = Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=33810432" sound.Looped = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) torso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") gui = Tool.PartyGui:clone() player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) mouseCon = mouse.Button1Down:connect(onActivated) end
function onUnequippedLocal() mouseCon:disconnect() gui:remove() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
function findClosePlayers()
local players = game.Players:GetChildren() local closePlayers = {} for i = 1, #players do if (players[i].Character.Torso.Position - torso.Position).magnitude < partyRadius then table.insert(closePlayers, players[i].Character) end end
return closePlayers
end
local enabled = false function onActivated()
if enabled then return end enabled = true
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Heat = 25 fire.Size = 2 fire.Color = Color3.new(1,153/255,51/255) fire.Parent = Tool.Handle
wait(2)
local noGo = false local part = Instance.new("Part") part.Size = Vector3.new(20,13.6,20) part.Transparency = 1 part.CanCollide = false part.Position = Vector3.new( torso.Position.x,torso.Position.y + 10, torso.Position.z) local bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0,1200000,0) bodyForce.Parent = part part.Touched:connect(function() noGo = true end) part.Parent = game.Workspace wait(0.1) part:remove()
fire:remove()
if noGo then if player then gui.Parent = player.PlayerGui end Tool.Handle.Fail:Play() wait(3) gui.Parent = nil enabled = false return end
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion") explosion.BlastPressure = 0 explosion.BlastRadius = 15 explosion.Position = torso.Position explosion.Parent = game.Workspace
local explosionSound = Instance.new("Sound") explosionSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Rocket shot.wav" explosionSound.Parent = Tool.Handle explosionSound:Play() debris:AddItem(explosionSound,2)
local partyPeople = findClosePlayers() for i = 1, #partyPeople do local scripter = Tool.DanceScript:clone() scripter.Parent = partyPeople[i] local animator = Tool.partyanim:clone() animator.Parent = partyPeople[i] scripter.Disabled = false end
--This call will cause a "wait" until the data comes back local root = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(33743813)
local instances = root:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then root:Remove() return end
root = root:FindFirstChild("DanceFloor") root.Parent = game.Workspace local children = root:GetChildren() debris:AddItem(root,18)
for i = 1, #children do if children[i].className == "Part" or children[i].className == "TrussPart" then children[i].CanCollide = false if children[i].BrickColor == BrickColor.new("Really black") then for j = 1, 5 do local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") if i == 1 then sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(1,51/255,154/255) elseif j == 2 then sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(51/255,205/255,51/255) elseif j == 3 then sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(1,1,0) elseif j == 4 then sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(0,51/255,205/255) elseif j == 5 then sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(1,0,0) sound.Parent = children[i] -- ensures music plays on first try if firstTime then wait(1) end sound:Play() firstTime = false end sparkles.Parent = children[i] end end end end
root:MoveTo(Vector3.new(torso.Position.x,torso.Position.y,torso.Position.z))
local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bodyPos.position = Vector3.new(torso.Position.x, torso.Position.y + 10, torso.Position.z) bodyPos.P = 10000 bodyPos.D = bodyPos.D bodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P,bodyPos.P) bodyPos.Parent = torso
wait(1.5)
bodyPos:remove()
for i = 1, #children do if children[i].className == "Part" or children[i].className == "TrussPart" then children[i].CanCollide = true end end
wait(20) if sound then sound:Stop() end enabled = false
end

local player = script.Parent local animFile = player:FindFirstChild("partyanim")
local anim = player.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(animFile)
anim:Play()
wait(15)
anim:Stop() animFile:remove() anim:remove() script:remove()
